newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: TABLE - SAfrica June M3 money supply up 12.79 pct.
newsitem.headline: TABLE - SAfrica June M3 money supply up 12.79 pct.

text.p: South Africa's year-on-year broadly defined M3 money supply grew 12.79 percent in June, preliminary Reserve Bank figures show.
May M3 growth was revised to 15.32 percent from a preliminary 15.40 percent.
Annual private sector credit growth was 16.39 percent, preliminary figures showed, against a revised 16.65 percent in May.
A Reuters consensus poll of economists forecast M3 year-on-year growth of 14.44 percent while private credit was seen expanding 15.19 percent.
